title.ph: Incompatible Changes and Limitations in Apache Impala (incubating)
Apache Impala (incubating) Incompatible Changes and Limitations

conbody.p: The Impala version covered by this documentation library contains the following incompatible changes. These are things such as file format changes, removed features, or changes to implementation, default configuration, dependencies, or prerequisites that could cause issues during or after an Impala upgrade.
